name: Blackjack Tales
description:
Once upon a time…
This story could start like this, but unfortunately due to the certain circumstances, it didn’t become fairy tale…
Greedo, the King of GreedVille, was one of the most cruel and merciless ruler of the GreedVille land for the last few decades. He was greedy and best of all loved his treasures and to play his favorite game – a BlackJack.
He was not always like this. Many centuries, the land, now called GreedVille, was a beautiful and very friendly kingdom – SunVille. People were kind and happy, and their king – Grado The Generous, was the most beloved king of all the times.
One day, the young man entered the gates of the SunVille. He was short and skinny, with black hoodie on his head. It was hard to see his face, but terrifying smile was seen on his face.
He came to the guards and said, that he has a gift to the King Grado, a game, which he never heard about. When guards asked his name, young man said…BlackJack.

This game is a mix of RPG and simulator of casino game – Black Jack.

Defeat all enemies, return the sun and happiness to the Kingdom and its citizens!
